name: Accelerate/Decelerate

time.condition: which you take when a creature you can see within 60 feet is hit with an attack

components.m: a drop of oil or a drop of molasses

entries: This spell speeds up or slows down an attack the instant before it strikes, lessening or multiplying its force.
{@b Accelerate.} Increase the damage the target takes by {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting modifier.
{@b Decelerate.} Reduce the damage the target takes by {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting modifier (to a minimum of 0 damage).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the change in damage increases by {@scaledamage 1d8|1-9|1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
